continue.name: continue
continue.description: keyword flag to indicate that the simulation should continue even if one or more solutions do not converge.

nocheck.name: nocheck
nocheck.description: keyword flag to indicate that the model input check routines should not be called prior to each time step. Checks are performed by default.

memory_print_option.name: memory_print_option
memory_print_option.description: is a flag that controls printing of detailed memory manager usage to the end of the simulation list file.  NONE means do not print detailed information. SUMMARY means print only the total memory for each simulation component. ALL means print information for each variable stored in the memory manager. NONE is default if MEMORY_PRINT_OPTION is not specified.

maxerrors.name: maxerrors
maxerrors.description: maximum number of errors that will be stored and printed.

tdis6.name: tdis6
tdis6.description: is the name of the Temporal Discretization (TDIS) Input File.

models.name: models
models.description: is the list of model types, model name files, and model names.

mtype.name: mtype
mtype.description: is the type of model to add to simulation.

mfname.name: mfname
mfname.longname: file name for model name file
mfname.description: is the file name of the model name file.

mname.name: mname
mname.description: is the user-assigned name of the model.  The model name cannot exceed 16 characters and must not have blanks within the name.  The model name is case insensitive; any lowercase letters are converted and stored as upper case letters.

exchanges.name: exchanges
exchanges.description: is the list of exchange types, exchange files, and model names.

exgfile.name: exgfile
exgfile.description: is the input file for the exchange.

exgmnamea.name: exgmnamea
exgmnamea.description: is the name of the first model that is part of this exchange.

exgmnameb.name: exgmnameb
exgmnameb.description: is the name of the second model that is part of this exchange.

group_num.name: group_num
group_num.description: is the group number of the solution group.  Solution groups must be numbered sequentially, starting with group number one.

mxiter.name: mxiter
mxiter.description: is the maximum number of outer iterations for this solution group.  The default value is 1.  If there is only one solution in the solution group, then MXITER must be 1.

solutiongroup.name: solutiongroup
solutiongroup.longname: solution type and models in the solution
solutiongroup.description: is the list of solution types and models in the solution.

slntype.name: slntype
slntype.description: is the type of solution.  The Integrated Model Solution (IMS6) is the only supported option in this version.

slnfname.name: slnfname
slnfname.description: name of file containing solution input.

slnmnames.name: slnmnames
slnmnames.longname: array of model names in this solution
slnmnames.description: is the array of model names to add to this solution.  The number of model names is determined by the number of model names the user provides on this line.
